alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LOWER KEYS IN MONROE COUNTY THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saddlebunch Keys, or near Big Coppitt Key, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Fleming Key, Key Haven, Geiger Key, Sunset Key, Shark Key, and Saddlebunch Keys. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
